channel.title: What The Hell?
channel.description: ok srry for the language guys, even though it wasnt really too bad.. but neways lol. why do you all keep posting all these moparscape and private server questions in the questions section when it clearly states at the top of the site that all moparscape questions and what not that has to deal with it is now "here" and it tells you the url. there is even a sticky at the top of the questions forums that states to not post about it in here. i just wanna hear from the noobs and leechers that do it? why cant you at least have a little curtesy and not be so lazy, just why.......

item.title: What The Hell?
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

lol i guess thats a good reason. but i wanna hear from you guys that do it…

Read full topic

item.title: What The Hell?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Because if they weren’t lazy and did something for themselves they wouldn’t be a leech.

[size=13pt]Leech[/size]

  1. Any of various chiefly moronic filesucking, bandwiidth hogging, and carnivorous ‘users’ of the class assholenea takeallus, of which one species (homo forumis) is generally found to suck in forums too.

  2. One that preys on or clings to another; a parasite, fileleech.

  3. One on who existance depends on the good deeds of others, but never themselves.

  4. One who does not support the community.

slx laughs as he leeches off P2P. ‘What fools they are!’, he thinks to himself, 'P2P my ass, P2ME I say! MUHAHAHAHAHA!!

Read full topic

seriously we need to just start layin the noob stick to some of them its just really starting to piss me off.
